key_themes: Monetary policy easing and rate-sensitive rotation
Mega-cap tech momentum vs. mid-cap weakness bifurcation
risk_factors: Low holiday volume amplifying downside moves and liquidation cascades in growth/crypto assets
Geopolitical escalation (China-U.S. defense tensions) creating medium-term headwinds
Regulatory tightening and enterprise software earnings deterioration signaling cyclical weakness in tech
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: Watch $700 call wall (active resistance, 1.4% away). Support at $670 (active, 2.9% away). QQQ: Testing $630 call wall resistance (active, 1.0% away); $625 near-term resistance (active, 0.2% away). Both indices supported by max pain gravitational pull ($687 SPY, $620 QQQ).
analysis.swing_levels: SPY: Hold above $670 support (active hedging zone) maintains bullish structure. $700 call wall remains primary resistance over 1-5 days; break above could target $730-$750 (dormant, 5.7%-8.6% away). QQQ: Consolidating near max pain $620; $630 call wall is near-term ceiling. Break above $630 targets $640 (2.6% away, active resistance). Downside floor: SPY $645 put wall (6.6%), QQQ $590 put wall (5.4%).
